item.title: Help Curreny (Delta)
item.dc:creator: @mostwanted8 mostwanted8
item.description:
@mostwanted8 wrote:

well hello whoever is out there i got a new source and i found this problem
i addded a new donator shop and here what i got when i click to buy an item

it keep saying coins with it
and here is the code

if ((ShopValue >= 1000) && (ShopValue < 1000000)) { ShopAdd = " (" + (ShopValue / 1000) + "K)"; } else if (ShopValue >= 1000000) { ShopAdd = " (" + (ShopValue / 1000000) + " million)"; } if (MyShopID == 8) { sM(getItemName(removeID)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" tokkul"+ShopAdd); } if (MyShopID == 19) { sM(getItemName(removeID)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" points"+ShopAdd); } if (MyShopID == 40) { sM(getItemName(removeID)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" Donator Points"+ShopAdd); } if (MyShopID == 1) { sM(getItemName(removeID)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" Pk Points"+ShopAdd); }else{ sM(getItemName(removeID)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" coins"+ShopAdd); }

i tried editing the code to this like the old source i have and it was working fine on it

if (MyShopID == 8) { sM(getItemName(removeID)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" tokkul"+ShopAdd); } else { if (MyShopID == 19) { sM(getItemName(removeID)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" points"+ShopAdd); } else { if (MyShopID == 40) { sM(getItemName(removeID)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" Donator Points"+ShopAdd); } else { if (MyShopID == 1) { sM(getItemName(removeID)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" Pk Points"+ShopAdd); }else{ sM(getItemName(removeID)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" coins"+ShopAdd); }
and i got a 100 errors
help me please

Read full topic
